newsitem.title: GREECE: BASKETBALL-NBA STAR JUWAN HOWARD IN ATHENS SEP 7-9 FOR NIKE EVENT.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-NBA STAR JUWAN HOWARD IN ATHENS SEP 7-9 FOR NIKE EVENT.

text.p: NBA star and Washington Bullets forward center Juwan Howard will be in Athens during September 7-9 invited by Nike, Elmec Sport said on Wednesday.
Howard will take part in a three-on-three tournament and a slam dunk competition in Glyfada stadium at 1200 local on Saturday which will be open to the public.
Howard will be available for autographs and will have surprise gifts for kids, the company said. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
